version_description:
This new version of Chess - Play & Learn brings our wonderful users two very special gifts...

1. Many, many bug fixes... Hurray!
2. Support for iPad Pro!

If you love this update — or the Chess app in general — it would help us greatly

This new version of Chess - Play & Learn brings our wonderful users two very special gifts...

1. Many, many bug fixes... Hurray!
2. Support for iPad Pro!

If you love this update — or the Chess app in general — it would help us greatly

- Important bug fixes for Live Chess, and for iOS 7 users.

If you love this Chess app, please take a moment and give us a fresh five-star rating... It really helps us out! Thanks and enjoy your chess!

Fewer bugs and crashes, more stability and fun!

If you love this update, please consider giving us a fresh 5-star rating in the App Store... It really helps us out!

- Fixed a crash affecting some iOS 7 users
- General stability improvements

If you love our chess app, please consider giving it a fresh, 5-star rating or review. It really helps, and we appreciate it!

A new version of the Chess.com app brings you dozens of bug fixes, interface and performance improvements and new features to make your chess more social and more fun! If you love this app, please give it a fresh 5-star rating or review - it really helps
Bug fixes!  If you love this app, please take a few seconds to give us a fresh 5-star rating in the App Store... It really helps us out!

Some fun new features and improvements in this update - including support for Apple Watch (see below)! If you love this version, please consider giving us a fresh 5-star rating in the App Store... It helps us so much! Thanks - and happy chess!

A few bug fixes, including a fix for Drills to allow users on older devices to enjoy this feature!

- Introducing "Guest mode": Chess fun with no log-in required!
- Improvements to Vision trainer, Member stats, News, and Articles
- Better Apple Watch alerts
- Look-and-feel enhancements everywhere!
- Bug fixes

If you love this update,

- Live Chess improvements, including more reliable player clocks
- You can once again use the Watch feature to observe your friends' Live games
- Fixed a bug which prevented some Diamond users from watching Video Lessons
- Other bug fixes and min

Bug fixes and stability improvements in this update!

If you love the app, please consider giving it a fresh five-star rating in the App Store... It really helps! Thank you!

If so, please consider giving the app a fresh 5-star rating in the App Store... It really helps us out. Thank you, and happy chess!

version_description:
* Support for iPhone X!
* Live Tournaments and Arenas!
* Log in / Sign up via Google
* Various other fixes and improvements. If you love this update, please consider giving us a fresh five-star review. We really appreciate it!

* A new & improved Computer. Play vs the “Komodo” engine, which offers 20 levels of human-like play!
